sources.autograph: Lucca, Istituto Musicale Boccherini, D.I.33, 'Sonata a quattro no. 11...' (separate parts)
sources.ms_copies_score: Lucca, Istituto Musicale Boccherini, B.I.114, 'Sonata a quattro no. 11...'
ms_copies_parts: Münster, Priesterseminarbibliothek, Santini HS. 533, 'Opera III, Concerto quinto...' (last movement entitled 'Affettuoso', without any mention of a trio)
Naples, Conservatorio. Two copies: 22.2.10, and 22.5.2, 'Quartetto no. 5...'
